TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Grid extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于管理 对象的主要和次要网格的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties that manage the major and minor grids of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供图表上网格的功能，并使用 每个对象的和属性公开 。This class provides the functionality for the grids on the chart, and is exposed using the and properties of each object. 默认情况下，主要网格线不会 设置其、 、 和 属性。Major grid lines by default do not have their , , , and properties set. 当未设置主要网格线的这些属性时， 控件将自动确定网格线的相应值。When these properties for major grid lines are not set, the control determines the appropriate values for grid lines automatically. 默认情况下，轴及其次要网格线的 、 、 和属性都 设置为 **Auto** (0) 。The axis and its minor grid lines by default have their , , , and properties set to **Auto** (0). 如果启用了轴标签或次要网格线并且未修改这些属性，则 控件会自动确定绘制次要网格线的频率。If axis labels or minor grid lines are enabled and these properties are not modified, the control automatically determines how often to draw the minor grid lines. 轴网格：Axis grids: - 可以启用或禁用。Can be enabled or disabled. - 具有确定第一次绘制位置的起点。Have a starting point that determines where they are first drawn. - 显示可为样式、宽度和颜色设置的行。Display lines that can be set for style, width and color. - 可以具有自动间隔或手动设置的间隔。Can have either automatic intervals, or intervals that are set manually.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定是否启用主要或次要网格线。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether major or minor grid lines are enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用，则为 ；如果已禁用，则为 。

span.span: if enabled, if disabled.

value.span: 对于主要网格对象，默认值为 ，对于次要网格对象，默认值为 。

span.span: The default is for major grid objects and for minor grid objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要和次要网格在启用时可见，在禁用时不可见。Major and minor grids are visible when enabled, and not visible when disabled. 如果禁用，则不会显示刻度线。Tick marks will not be displayed if disabled. 您可以通过将属性设置为来禁用刻度线 。You can disable tick marks by setting the property to .

summary.span: 获取或设置主要网格线或次要网格线之间的间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval between major or minor grid lines.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示网格线之间的间隔。

span.span: A value that represents the interval between grid lines.

value.span: 默认情况下，不对主要网格线设置该值 ()。

span.span: By default, the value is not set () for major grid lines.

value.span: 对于次要网格线，默认值为零 (0)。

span.span: For minor grid lines, the default value is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，不会为轴标签、主要刻度线和主要网格线设置此属性。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未设置该属性，则默认情况下，通过 在设计时显式使用，或 在运行时分配值来确定，此属性的实际值由 图表元素（如网格线或刻度线）所属的对象的属性确定。If it is not set - either by default, by explicitly using at design time, or by assigning a value of at run time - the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object to which the chart element, such as a grid line or tick mark, belongs. 次要刻度线和网格线的间隔从不受属性值的影响 。The interval of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the property value. 间隔以轴单位来度量，并确定适用的图表元素的绘制频率。The interval is measured in axis units, and determines how often an applicable chart element is drawn. 例如，假设柱形图的 X 轴步骤为 (1，即1、2、3、4等) ;如果将 X 轴的属性设置为2，则将为每个其他列显示一个轴标签。For example, suppose a column chart has an X axis step of 1 (that is, 1, 2, 3, 4, and so forth); if you set the property for the X axis to 2, an axis label will be displayed for every other column. 对于所有适用的图表元素也是如此。The same holds true for all applicable chart elements. 换句话说，如果在前面的示例中使用的是带 0.5 的行，并且其 属性为2，则会在0.5、2.5、4.5 等中显示条带线。In other words, if in the previous example strip lines were being used, with an of 0.5, and their property was 2, a strip line would be displayed at 0.5, 2.5, 4.5, and so on. 如果将图表元素属性设置 `Interval` 为零，控件将自动确定间隔 。If you set a chart element `Interval` property to zero, an interval will be automatically determined by the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double IntervalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置网格线的偏移量。

span.span: Gets or sets the offset of grid lines.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示间隔偏移量。

span.span: A value that represents the interval offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，不会为轴标签、主要刻度线和主要网格线设置此属性。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未设置，则默认情况下，在设计时显式指定 "未设置"，或在运行时为其赋值，则 此属性的实际值由 图表元素（如网格线或刻度线）所属的对象的属性确定。If it is not set - either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set"at design time, or by assigning it a value of at run time - the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object that the chart element, such as a grid line or a tick mark, belongs to. 次要刻度线和网格线的间隔偏移量从不受对象属性的值的影响 。The interval offset of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the property of the object. 属性设置定义偏移量的度量单位。The property setting defines the units of measurement of the offset. 可以为负值。The can be a negative value.

summary.span: 获取或设置主要网格线和次要网格线的间隔偏移量类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of major and minor grid lines.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指示间隔类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the interval type.

value.span: 默认情况下，不对主要网格线设置该值。

span.span: By default it is not set for major grid lines.

value.span: 次要网格线的默认值为 。

span.span: The default value for minor grid lines is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，不会为轴标签、主要刻度线和主要网格线设置此属性。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未设置该属性，则默认情况下，在设计时显式指定 "未设置"，或在运行时为其赋值，则 此属性的实际值由 图表元素-网格线或刻度线（例如）所属的对象的属性确定。If it is not set - either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of at run time - the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object that the chart element - a grid line or tick mark, for example - belongs to. 次要刻度线和网格线的间隔偏移量类型永远不会受 属性值的影响。The interval offset type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the property value. 如果此 "间隔偏移量" 类型设置为 ，则 将使用属性。If this interval offset type is set to , the property will be used.

summary.span: 获取或设置主要网格线或次要网格线的间隔类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval type for major or minor grid lines.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指示间隔类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the interval type.

value.span: 默认情况下，不对轴标签、主要刻度线和主要网格线设置该值，而是使用 枚举值。

span.span: By default it is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines, by using the enumeration value.

value.span: 对于次要刻度线和网格线，默认值为 。

span.span: The default value for minor tick marks and grid lines is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，不会为轴标签、主要刻度线和主要网格线设置此属性。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未设置该属性，则默认情况下，在设计时显式使用 "未设置"，或者在运行时为其赋值，则 此属性的实际值由 图表元素-网格线或刻度线（例如）所属的对象的属性确定。If it is not set - either by default, by explicitly using "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of at run time - the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object that the chart element - a grid line or tick mark, for example - belongs to. 次要刻度线和网格线的间隔类型永远不会受属性值的影响 。The interval type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the property. 间隔类型可设置为 ; 间隔的类型取决于所绘制对象的 X 值或 Y 值 ，具体取决于适用元素所属的轴。Interval types can be set to ; the type of interval then depends on either the X-values or Y-values of the plotted objects, depending on which axis the applicable elements belong to. 如果数据点的值为或值，则设置值轴的属性仅会产生效果 `double` 。Setting the property for a value axis will only have an effect if the values of the data points are or `double` values. 此外， 绘制的或的属性 必须设置为 或 。Also, the or property of the plotted must be set to or . 如果 属性 (或 属性（具体取决于绘图对象的相关轴) 为或），则设置分类轴的属性仅会产生效果 。Setting the property for a categorical axis will only have an effect if the property (or property, depending on the axis in question) of the plotted object is either or . > [!NOTE] > 星期日被视为一周的第一天。Sunday is considered the first day of the week.

summary.span: 获取或设置网格线颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the line color of a grid.
A object.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于指定主要刻度线和次要刻度线或网格的颜色。The property is used to specify the color of major and minor tick marks or grids.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于指定主要和次要刻度线或网格的线条样式。The property can be used to specify the line style of major and minor tick marks or grids. 该行可以是纯色、点线等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.

summary.span: 获取或设置主要网格线和次要网格线的线条宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the line width of major and minor grid lines.

value.span: 一个表示线条宽度（以像素为单位）的 。

span.span: An that represents the line width in pixels.
The default value is one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于指定主要和次要刻度线或网格的线条宽度（以像素为单位）。The property can be used to specify the line width, in pixels, of major and minor tick marks or grids.
